name: Black Wings
short_description: The Black Wings group is for Black women in technology majors to share experiences and advice, have a familiar community within the tech industry, and gain support from having a group of women with shared interests.

name: IBM TechXchange Dev Day: AI and Automation Unpacked + Hackathon
short_description: Join IBM TechXchange Dev Day for a full day of technical content designed for developers, engineers, and data scientists, featuring expert-led sessions and hands-on demos.
